COMMENT_TX: $Casey Stengel turned toward 2B then walked back to 1B
$Rosy Ryan held 2B thinking the ball would be caught
$the ball struck the top of the fence; Heinie Groh thought it was a HR and jogged around the bases until he was tagged out
$a fan reached over the fence and appeared to interfere with the flight of the ball
Rain started falling
10-minute rain delay

45-minute rain delay; while the canvas covers were being removed from the field, it started to rain again but Umpire Charlie Moran sided with the fans who were yelling 'Play Ball'; the Pirates objected and said they would file a protest with the league office.
30-minute rain delay then the game was called
$Rabbit Maranville slid into 1B, spiking George Kelly on the ankle
previous two plays really one play
$Kiki Cuyler rounded 1B too far
Weather: cold enough for overcoats
$Billy Southworth injured his shoulder making diving catch
It rained the entire game
Excellent baseball weather
Weather: humid
$the Barnes brothers pitch against each other
$Ray Powell rounded 1B too far
$Travis Jackson rounded 2B too far
$Frank Frisch reinjured his left ankle colliding with Andy High
Weather: hot and humid
Weather: too hot for baseball
rain started in the eighth
ej,smite106,P,hartb901,Balls and strikes $Earl Smith ejected by HP umpire Bob Hart
It began to rain during the 4th inning
$Max Carey let himself be put out because the Pirates were anxious to get the game over before the game was called because of the weather

play,7,0,bigbc101,??,,5/FL play,7,0,carem101,??,,63 play,7,0,cuylk101,??,,HR/F9D play,7,0,wrigg102,??,,S9 play,7,0,trayp101,??,,54(1)/FO play,7,1,snydf101,??,,S6/G6S play,7,1,bentj101,??,,5/FL $after a 30 minute rain delay with Billy Southworth at bat, the game was called on account of rain & darkness; the score reverted to the previous inning and Cuyler's HR did not count; the Pirates scored one run in the top of the seventh and there had been two batters in the bottom of the frame
Weather: ideal

ej,carem101,P,hartb901,Threw bat at umpire ej,mckeb101,M,hartb901,Defending Carey $Max Carey and Pirates Manager Bill McKechnie ejected by HP umpire Bob Hart; Carey flipped his bat towards Hart as he ran to 1B
$Kiki Cuyler was knocked out as he slid into Frank Frisch's elbow at 2B
Weather: too hot for baseball
Weather: sweltering hot
$Frank Snyder avoided George Grantham's tag but was called out for running out of the base line
$Pat Duncan rounded 1B too far
$Freddy Lindstrom was trapped but scrambled back to 3B; Bill Terry had reached 3B during the rundown but was declared out

$Milt Stock was out on an attempted double steal; Hank DeBerry ran for 2B while Rosy Ryan held the ball; Ryan turned toward 1B but threw home instead and retired Stock; Brooklyn argued to Umpire Bill Klem that this was a balk but Klem refused the claim; Brooklyn continued to argue until Klem finally asked Umpire Frank Wilson about it; Wilson called it a balk, Klem reversed himself, and the run was allowed
$Specs Toporcer turned his ankle and limped into 3B
$Hack Wilson rounded 2B too far
$Rube Bressler called out for interfering with Heinie Groh
$Heinie Groh hurt his right knee on the slide
$Frank Frisch hurt his right hand sliding at the plate

$Hugh McQuillan was bumped in the head by Pie Traynor while trying to field the bunt along the 1B line; McQuillan rushed at Traynor with fists clenched but other players intervened; the Giants argued for interference
$during Bill Terry's AB, Umpire Hank O'Day called a ball without a pitch being made when Emil Yde dropped the ball during his windup
$attempted squeeze; Frank Snyder was chased back to 3B where Jack Bentley had advanced
